definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)

sentences.english: Appoints Wang Zhonghua is commander, the white ethylation is assistant deputy commander.
sentences.chinese: 任命王仲华为司令，白乙化为副司令。

sentences.english: Crosstown rival Huawei would be well advised to make similar moves.
sentences.chinese: 外界认为，中兴的直接竞争对手华为也应该这么做。

sentences.english: Huawei has developed without making large acquisitions.
sentences.chinese: 华为没有大型收购案也已经发展起来了。

sentences.english: But ZET is unhappy to be regarded as "the second Huawei".
sentences.chinese: 但中兴对于自己被视为“第二个华为”极为不快。

sentences.english: The head of the company's U.S. operations, however, says Huawei is willing to play the long game.
sentences.chinese: 但华为美国公司的负责人说，华为愿意从长计议。

sentences.english: The head of the company's U.S. operations, however, says Huawei is willing to play the long game.
sentences.chinese: 但华为美国公司的负责人说，华为愿意从长计议。

sentences.english: It hopes smartphones and tablet PCs will help it capture that market.
sentences.chinese: 华为希望智能手机和平板电脑能够帮助企业开拓市场。

sentences.english: Cao Hua to can cast off Chen Juan as soon as possible, also having this idea.
sentences.chinese: 曹华为了能尽快摆脱陈娟，也正有此意。

sentences.english: Huawei's growth paralleled the herky-jerky rise of many Chinese firms.
sentences.chinese: 华为的成长可以媲美其他急剧发展的中国公司。
为什么单挑华为的刺呢？

sentences.english: Hu Henghua was appointed Director of the Development and Reform Commission of Hunan province.
sentences.chinese: 任命胡衡华为湖南省发改委主任。

sentences.english: Liu Chenghua was appointed Director of the Department of Culture, Radio, Film, TV, Press and Publication of Jinan.
sentences.chinese: 任命刘程华为济南市文化广电新闻出版局局长。

sentences.english: But Huawei is facing resistance that goes beyond pure competition with its peers.
sentences.chinese: 但华为所面临的阻力，并不仅仅来自同行的正当竞争。

sentences.english: Before receiving training here, she once visited the headquarters of Huawei in Shenzhen, China.
sentences.chinese: 在这里培训前，她曾经到过中国的深圳参观华为总部。

sentences.english: Huawei FDD/TDD LTE solution has been verified in 20+ trials worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 华为在全世界的20多个试验已经得到验证。

definition: Xiaomi, Chinese electronics company founded in 2010

three major stars of the Three Stars 參宿|参宿[Shen1 xiu4] Chinese constellation/the belt of Orion/three spirits 福[fu2], 祿|禄[lu4], and 壽|寿[shou4] associated with the Three Stars 參宿|参宿[Shen1 xiu4] Chinese constellation
Sanxing or Sanhsing township in Yilan county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], Taiwan/Samsung (South Korean electronics company)
Google, Internet company and search engine
